panels.description: The number of targets that are considered healthy.
panels.title: Healthy Hosts Count (Min)

panels.description: The number of targets that are considered healthy.
panels.title: Healthy Hosts Count (Max)

panels.description: The number of targets that are considered unhealthy.
panels.title: Unhealthy Hosts Count (Max)

panels.description: The number of targets that are considered unhealthy.
panels.title: Unealthy Hosts Count (Min)

panels.description: The total number of concurrent flows (or connections) from clients to targets. This metric includes connections in the SYN_SENT and ESTABLISHED states. TCP connections are not terminated at the load balancer, so a client opening a TCP connection to a target counts as a single flow.
panels.title: Average Active Flow Count

panels.description: The total number of concurrent TLS flows (or connections) from clients to targets. This metric includes only connections in the ESTABLISHED states.
panels.title: Average Active Flow Count TLS

panels.description: The total number of new flows (or connections) established from clients to targets in the time period.
panels.title: New Flow Count

panels.description: The total number of new TLS flows (or connections) established from clients to targets in the time period.
panels.title: New Flow Count TLS

panels.description: The total number of reset (RST) packets sent from a client to a target. These resets are generated by the client and forwarded by the load balancer.
panels.title: Client Reset Count

panels.description: The total number of reset (RST) packets sent from a target to a client. These resets are generated by the target and forwarded by the load balancer.
panels.title: Target TCP Reset Count

panels.description: The total number of reset (RST) packets generated by the load balancer.
panels.title: Load Balancer TCP Reset Count

panels.description: The total number of TLS handshakes that failed during negotiation between a client and a TLS listener.
panels.title: Client TLS Negotiation Errors

panels.description: The total number of TLS handshakes that failed during negotiation between a TLS listener and a target.
panels.title: Target TLS Negotiation Errors

panels.description: The total number of bytes processed by the load balancer over IPv4 and IPv6. This count includes traffic to and from clients and Lambda functions, and traffic from an Identity Provider (IdP) if user authentication is enabled.
panels.title: Processed Bytes

panels.description: The total number of bytes processed by TLS listeners.
panels.title: Processed Bytes TLS

panels.description: The number of load balancer capacity units (LCU) used by your load balancer. You pay for the number of LCUs that you use per hour. For more information, see Elastic Load Balancing Pricing.
panels.title: Consumed Load Balancer Capacity Units
